title: WoodEgg
body: Wood does great things to eggs-^c:5f41a0;pyo^c:pop;. Have you tried it all together-^c:5f41a0;pyo^c:pop;? #line:10001100

title: MakeEgg
body: If an egg looks like a thing you probably use that to make it-^c:5f41a0;pyo^c:pop;. That should be obvious-^c:5f41a0;pyo^c:pop;. #line:10002100

title: EggWood
body: If you don't like breaking decorations, don't worry-^c:5f41a0;pyo^c:pop;. Grow Eggwood-^c:5f41a0;pyo^c:pop;. #line:10003100

title: NextYear
body: We'll be back next year-^c:5f41a0;pyo^c:pop;. You don't have to finish everything this year-^c:5f41a0;pyo^c:pop;. #line:10004100

title: GrowEgg
body: One egg you have to grow-^c:5f41a0;pyo^c:pop;. It might take a long time to get it-^c:5f41a0;pyo^c:pop;. #line:10005200

title: HopBunny
body: I am obligated to hop for you-^c:5f41a0;pyo^c:pop;. Because I am a bunny-^c:5f41a0;pyo^c:pop;. ^c:5f41a0;Hop. Hop.^c:pop; #line:12111100

title: ChangePetals
body: Changing the number of petals you use can give you a different egg-^c:5f41a0;pyo^c:pop;. #line:10011100

title: GatherEgg
body: Things you can gather make interesting eggs-^c:5f41a0;pyo^c:pop;. #line:10021100
But you know that because you're smart-^c:5f41a0;pyo^c:pop;. #line:10021200

title: 3Pets
body: Alice will give you three kinds of pets-^c:5f41a0;pyo^c:pop;. But there are ways to make them too-^c:5f41a0;pyo^c:pop;. #line:10031100

title: RotateHedge
body: Rotate the Easter hedge to get different shapes-^c:5f41a0;pyo^c:pop;. You can do that with most fences-^c:5f41a0;pyo^c:pop;. #line:10041100

title: AprilEgg
body: Set the May or April eggs down and then pick them like a mushroom to open them. #line:10051100

title: ScavengeEgg
body: If you can scavenge it you can probably get an egg out of it-^c:5f41a0;pyo^c:pop;. #line:10111100

title: GiftsEgg
body: Pets, Eggwood, and May eggs all give you different gifts-^c:5f41a0;pyo^c:pop;. #line:10211100
Get a lot of them if you're smart-^c:5f41a0;pyo^c:pop;. #line:10211200

title: FoodEgg
body: Use food on an egg at the combine table to try to hatch it-^c:5f41a0;pyo^c:pop;. #line:10311100

title: BunnyPerson
body: Do you want to be a bunny person-^c:5f41a0;pyo^c:pop;? Pets will give you a costume-^c:5f41a0;pyo^c:pop;. #line:10411100
Not enough-^c:5f41a0;pyo^c:pop;? You can reincarnate as a leoporid in your next life-^c:5f41a0;pyo^c:pop;. #line:10411200

title: PotionEgg
body: Some eggs need more power than just a petal-^c:5f41a0;pyo^c:pop;. Use a potion-^c:5f41a0;pyo^c:pop;. #line:10511100
